title: HoP 367 - Brian Copenhaver on Renaissance Magic
itunes:title: HoP 367 - Brian Copenhaver on Renaissance Magic
description: Our guest Brian Copenhaver joins us to explain how Ficino and other Renaissance philosophers thought about magic.
